title: CB can increase MS by buying bonds

content.question: A central bank can increase the money supply by

choices.label: selling gold reserves to the banks
buying government bonds on the open market
buying gold from foreign central banks

content.answer: buying government bonds on the open market

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
